message: Let's start with a fair split. I propose we each take a share proportional to our perceived value of the money.  I'll take 60%, you get 40%.
I appreciate your fairness, but I believe the value of the money is not so different between us. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor, as I'm willing to take more risk in this game. What do you think?
Let's be reasonable. Inflation is hitting us both, so a 50/50 split seems fair.  This ensures we both get a decent share before things get worse.
